page.title: 18EAST ST.ALBANS
page.content: { Eating out.}Two Indian restaurants and one Italian. {Langtrys,}French,is known for its seafood and named after Lily Langtry, famous Edwardian beauty.Visited by many famous people including David Essex,Lord MacAlpine,Lord Drake and an American basketball team. {Religions in our {School.}Moslem-13,C of E-36,R.C.-5, Chapels-9,no religion-34.{Junior {Interests}judo,fishing,skating,cub scouts,guides,brownies,swimming, Saturday Club and disco.{Music Lessons Recorder,guitar,organ,drum,cornet, piano,violin,trumpet,cymbals,banjo, flute and saxophone. {Housing}early 20th century terraced property with one new 13 storey block of flats, housing 80 families.
